main event: On August 2, 1962, two adults and three children observed a bright, rotating light in the sky over Orcas Island, Washington.
interesting points: The object was approximately 100 yards in diameter and was visible for several minutes before disappearing., The object emitted no sound and was several hundred feet above the ground., Witnesses described a triangle of luminous bright objects moving very fast., The observed object(s) seemed to be a couple of hundred feet in diameter., This sighting was deemed worthy of investigation and was reported shortly after it occurred.
sighted object: a bright rotating light in the sky
